alert.note: Alert for Greene (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 4:49PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Warning for... Northern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated rain has subsided across the area; however, earlier heavy rainfall has resulted in continued widespread creek flooding. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. * Creeks and low lying areas acrossed the warned area will likely remain flooded for the next few hours as heavy rain waters continue to drain. Culverts and roads will remain under stress as rapidly flowing runoff may cause continued washouts across the area. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... State Line, Old Avera, Clark, Bothwell, Piave, Avera, Smithtown, Sand Hill and Knobtown.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
